page.title: 12A DAY IN MY LIFE IN DENBURY
page.content:
I get up in the morning at about half past seven and have my breakfast At ten past eight we have to leave for my brother to catch the school bus. He goes to secondary school in Newton Abbot. Then mum drops me off at Denbury School. At school we have two teachers taking us for our lessons, one in the morning and one in the afternoon. We do a lot of project work and we often use the computer to help us. We also do maths, language work, games, music and drama. This term we are doing a play called{"Kings and {Things".}After school I go home with my friend Robert to wait for my mum. When we get back I have my tea and then watch T.V until about 9.30 p.m. when I go to bed.
{Darren Smith Age 11
